socialmedia.title: Designer
socialmedia.desc: Our Design service transforms ideas into professional, creative artwork aligned with your goals. Whether for social media, branding, graphic materials, or custom projects, we deliver visuals that connect, communicate, and sell. Your brand deserves to be seen with personality and impact!

socialmedia.title: Video editing
socialmedia.desc: Your videos deserve impact and professionalism! 3XMEND's video editing turns recordings into engaging content, with precise cuts, just-the-right effects, and a visual identity aligned with your purpose. Bring your ideas to life and stand out with productions that truly communicate your message. Let's create something amazing together!

socialmedia.desc: Your brand on social media with strategy, creativity, and results! With 3XMEND‚Äôs Social Media service, you get planned content, professional designs, engaging captions, and a strong digital presence. We handle your communication to attract, connect, and sell every day. Stop posting just for the sake of posting‚Äîgrow with us!

socialmedia.desc: Stop talking to everyone and start reaching who really matters! With 3XMEND‚Äôs ADS service, your campaigns are strategically planned, optimized, and targeted to deliver real results. Whether to sell, attract followers, or strengthen your brand, we create ads that convert and make your investment worthwhile. Advertise smart, advertise with 3XMEND!

socialmedia.desc: Turn your knowledge into a successful digital product with 3XMEND‚Äôs course creation! Our team takes care of everything: content structure, scripts, recording, editing, visual identity, and publishing. Your course ready to sell, with professional quality, engaging teaching, and results focus. Teaching has never been so easy and profitable. Let‚Äôs create together!

socialmedia.desc: Want to show up on Google when your clients search for you? 3XMEND makes it happen! With our SEO service, your website gains more visibility, authority, and qualified traffic. We optimize content, structure, and keywords to put your brand at the top of searches and ahead of the competition. More clicks, more visits, more sales!

socialmedia.desc: Turn your brand into an unforgettable experience! With 3XMEND, your intros come to life with creativity and impact, delivering your message clearly and professionally. Stand out with animations that make a mark!

socialmedia.title: Brand
socialmedia.desc: Your brand needs soul, purpose, and presence‚Äîand that‚Äôs exactly what 3XMEND delivers! With our Physical and Digital Product Creation service, we develop everything you need: visual identity, design, packaging, promotional materials, and even launch content. Whether it‚Äôs an e-book, course, info product, or physical product, we deliver complete solutions for you to launch with quality, authority, and results. Your product starts here!

Whether to showcase your brand or sell your products online, we deliver optimized, secure, and conversion-ready websites. Enough with amateur digital presence‚Äîwith 3XMEND, your showcase is top-level!

Perfect for businesses that value organization, automation, and data-driven decision-making. Gain full control over what truly matters with technology tailored to your business!

parceiros.desc: Ana Farias‚Äô Instagram is dedicated to promoting a balanced and healthy approach to nutrition. With the motto 'I help you achieve results with the balance you‚Äôve always wanted', Ana offers personalized online consultations to help her followers reach their goals sustainably.

parceiros.desc: Fabiana is dedicated to promoting health and quality of life through physiotherapy. With the motto 'Movement is quality of life', she shares content that encourages healthy habits and the importance of physical activity.

parceiros.title: Flavia Palheiros (Vinha)
parceiros.desc: @corro_pra_descansar is a space dedicated to sharing a passion for running as a form of self-care and well-being. The profile offers content that inspires and motivates runners of all levels, promoting the idea that running is a way to rest the mind and strengthen the body.

sobre.desc: 3XMEND is your digital agency where we take care of your business, from positioning to the click that generates sales.
sobre.desc2: Our way of working is simple: understand your business, create personalized strategies, and execute with excellence. We dive into your universe, study your market, and put into practice actions that really make a difference in digital.
sobre.desc3: Planning, action, and results. No guessing, no beating around the bush.
sobre.titleAgen2: You are the talent. We are the team behind the success.
sobre.pAgen1: You have the potential, charisma, knowledge, or influence. And we have the right strategies to turn all of that into a strong, desirable, and professional brand.
sobre.pAgen2: Te Agenciamos is our strategic arm aimed at those who want to be more than just seen ‚Äî they want to be remembered, recognized, and valued in digital. We step in to take care of your image, positioning, content, business opportunities, and online presence with strategic vision, creativity, and consistency.

faq.questao: How can I create an online course with 3XMEND?
faq.resposta: 3XMEND offers full support in creating online courses. This includes everything from content planning, script development, class recording, video editing, to publishing on learning platforms.

faq.questao: How does 3XMEND‚Äôs social media service work?
faq.resposta: 3XMEND‚Äôs social media service focuses on strategically positioning your brand on social networks with relevant, creative, and goal-aligned content. The team handles the entire process: topic planning, creating artwork and texts, scheduling posts, and analyzing results. The goal is to increase your engagement, attract new followers, and turn your digital presence into an effective sales channel.

Yes, websites developed by 3XMEND follow the main trends in the digital market. The team uses modern, responsive design (adaptable to mobile, tablet, and desktop), focus on user experience (UX/UI), and search engine optimization (SEO). In addition, the websites are built with updated technology and designed to offer performance, security, and scalability, ensuring that your business is always aligned with best market practices.

3XMEND offers a variety of design services aimed at strengthening your brand‚Äôs visual identity and improving communication with your audience. The main services include: logo creation, complete visual identity, artwork for social media, graphic materials (such as cards, banners, and presentations), as well as custom layouts for websites and courses. Everything is developed with a focus on creativity, strategy, and alignment with the client‚Äôs goals.

faq.questao: How does 3XMEND help me create physical or digital products?
faq.resposta: 3XMEND helps you create physical and digital products by offering full support, from the idea‚Äôs conception to design and promotional material. For digital products, such as e-books, courses, or info products, the team handles planning, visual identity, layout, recording, and content editing. For physical products, they assist in brand development, labels, packaging, and visual communication. Everything is strategically designed to make your product professional, attractive, and market-ready.
